title.en: Aspiration at the Moment of Death

text.en: I take refuge in the body, speech, mind, qualities and activity of the noble gurus, who embody the Three Jewels and Three Roots.
text.en-trans: chok sum tsa sum gyi ngowor gyurpa lama dampa nam kyi ku sung tuk  yönten trinlé kyi tsok la kyab su chi’o

text.en: I supplicate you: inspire me with your blessings, I pray!
text.en-trans: solwa depso chin gyi labpar dzé du sol

text.en: Fulfil these aspirations of mine, I pray!
text.en-trans: mönlam tabpa di nam drubpar dzé du sol

text.en: From this life onwards, throughout all my future lives, may I never develop even the slightest negative intention towards sentient beings, who are my very own parents!
text.en-trans: mi ngé kyewa né kyewa tamché du pama semchen tamché la sampa ngenpa pu tsam yang kyewar ma gyur chik

text.en: May my positive intentions and actions flow uninterruptedly like a stream!
text.en-trans: sam jor zangpo chu gyün zhin du gyün mi chépar gyur chik

text.en: With the exception of the puregaṇacakrafeast on the path of Vajrayāna, which does not involve any desire to eat, may I never consume or be involved in the consumption of even the slightest trace of flesh or blood from any living being!
text.en-trans: za dö kyi tsok khor ma yinpé dorje tekpé lam nampar dakpé tsok khor la longchö ma tok drowa semchen tamché kyi sha trak zawa dang tungwa dang bakpa la sok chung zé kyang mi chépar shok chik

text.en: May I always recall these vows as vividly as I do now!
text.en-trans: damcha di dak dü data zhin du drenpar gyur chik

text.en: For as long as I lack the two qualities of possession and freedom,1may I never incur even the slightest karmic debt based on the misuse of offerings!
text.en-trans: denpa dang drolwé yönten nyi dang mi den zhin du kor zé len chak la tildru tsam yang mi bakpar shok chik

text.en: May I be able to sacrifice my own body, speech and mind without the slightest impediment, even it is for the sake of just a single sentient being!
text.en-trans: semchen chik gi dön du’ang rang gi go sumpo tongwa la tokpa chung zé tsam yang mi chepar shok chik

text.en: Through the power of the truth of the unchangingdharmatānature and the infallible law of causality, may these selfless aspirations be entirely fulfilled!
text.en-trans: chönyi gyurwa mepa dang chöchen gyu dré luwa mepé denpé tob kyi rang dö dang dralwé mönlam di nam yong su drubpar gyur chik

text.en: Through the truth of the Three Jewels, may they be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: kön chok sum gyi denpé drubpar gyur chik

text.en: Through the truth of the noble gurus, may they be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: lama dampa nam kyi denpé drubpar gyur chik
